identifier.description: Name of the directory holding the collection - NOT quoted since any LIS identifier need not be quoted.

provenance.description: Information on the source of the data

source.description: URI pointing to the data source.

synopsis.description: Short description of the collection (up to 200 chars).

related_to.description: Identifier(s) of related collection(s) in the LIS datastore, comma-separated.

scientific_name_abbrev.description: LIS datastore gensp identifier: first three letters of genus plus first two letters of species, all lower case.

genotype.description: List of genotypes: one for a single genotype, single A x B entry for a biparental map, or a list.

chromosome_prefix.description: Comma-separated list of prefixes identifying chromosome records.

supercontig_prefix.description: Comma-separated list of prefixes identifying supercontig (non-chromosome) records.

dataset_doi.description: DOI pointing to the dataset; NOTE this is NOT a URI!

publication_doi.description: DOI pointing to the publication associated with this collection; NOTE this is NOT a URI!

original_file_creation_date.description: YYYY-MM-DD date IN QUOTES when data were created at the source.

local_file_creation_date.description: YYYY-MM-DD date IN QUOTES when data were created at LIS.

dataset_release_date.description: YYYY-MM-DD date IN QUOTES when data were released to the public.

publication_title.description: Title of the publication associated with this collection.

contributors.description: List of contributors in lastname, firstname format, separated by semicolons; typically the publication authors.

data_curators.description: List of curators that put this collection together, separated by semicolons.

keywords.description: Keywords associated with this collection, separated by commas.

citation.description: Bibliographic long-form citation of the publication.

genotyping_platform.description: Genotyping platform used in a genetic experiment.

genotyping_method.description: Description of the genotyping method used in a genetic experiment.

expression_unit.description: Expression data unit used in a gene expression experiment (e.g. TPM).

genetic_map.description: Name of genetic map, typically the prefix of linkage groups.
